Name: Zoning, Belmont Osborn Rezoning, Brooklyn (N 220439 ZRK)
Title: Application number N 220439 ZRK (Belmont Osborn Rezoning) submitted by Osborn Belmont Properties, LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 16, Council District 41.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
